channel.title: tutorials on The TechGlider
channel.description: Recent content in tutorials on The TechGlider

item.title: Tutorials on TechGlider site are fully functional now!
item.description: After a lot of requests from my friends and those who visited the Tutorials section in the test version of TechGlider site, I have finally uploaded all the available tutorials and this means they are downloadable now! Visit http://www.techglider.in/tutorials for all available tutorials. I will publish many more (free) tutorials in that section with some of those written by myself. ;-) Feel free to post comments if you face any problems.
